triples.name: Transformer (deep learning)
triples.relevance: DETR uses transformer architecture with encoder-decoder design for end-to-end object detection.

triples.name: Object detection
triples.relevance: The paper addresses object detection, the core task of identifying and localizing objects in images.

triples.name: Attention (machine learning)
triples.relevance: The paper discusses attention learning in the decoder as a key component of DETR-based detectors.

triples.name: Region Based Convolutional Neural Networks
triples.relevance: Faster RCNN uses region-based convolutional networks, providing a baseline for one-to-many label assignment.

triples.name: Convolutional neural network
triples.relevance: CNNs are fundamental building blocks used in modern object detectors including the encoder backbone.

triples.name: List of datasets in computer vision and image processing
triples.relevance: COCO is a major benchmark dataset for evaluating object detection methods mentioned in the paper.

triples.name: Vision transformer
triples.relevance: ViT-L backbone is used for achieving state-of-the-art results in the paper experiments.

triples.name: Autoencoder
triples.relevance: Encoder-decoder architecture is the fundamental framework used by DETR and related detectors.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel training scheme within the machine learning framework.

triples.name: Computer vision
triples.relevance: Object detection is a core computer vision task addressed by the paper's method.

triples.name: Deep learning
triples.relevance: Deep learning forms the foundation for the neural network-based detection methods.

triples.name: Hybrid neural network
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a hybrid training scheme combining one-to-one and one-to-many label assignments in DETR-based detectors.

triples.name: Multi-task learning
triples.relevance: The method uses auxiliary heads with multiple supervision signals, similar to multi-task learning approaches.

triples.name: Labeled data
triples.relevance: Label assignment is a core component of the training scheme for supervised object detection.
